The timing of the picture being taken: which was after the White House issued guidance for states to start lifting business restrictions implemented to slow the spread of COVID-19.
The different contexts in which the pict: one as an illustration for a story about beaches opening on a limited basis near Jacksonville, Florida, and the other as part of a Facebook post linking to a blog about the pandemic that covered multiple issues.
The explanation provided by the spokesma: Greg Vederman, regarding the site's algorithm handling social media posts and how it pulled a picture from the blog showing the beach in Florida and a headline about the death toll in Los Angeles.
